attributes.action: back the much needed investment into Halifax Piece Hall and the other areas of the town
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is currently a plan to apply for: £4 Million, from:  Yorkshire Forward, Arts Council Yorkshire and Calderdale Council.

This would be a fantastic addition to the already regeneration of Halifax railway Station, which is hoped to be finished end of July 2009 beginning of: August 2009.

As this is the case, I would urge local people, and visitors whom have visited Halifax, to get behind this idea, and back the proposals, to finally get Halifax, and it's surrounding areas back on it's feet especially through these turbulent times.

Thank You!
